sentences: Pardal lendav lendur oli väga kogenud.
Meil on veel üks lend homme.
context: In Estonian, 'lend' can mean either 'flight' (the act or instance of flying) as a noun, or it can be the verb form 'lennata' which means 'to fly'. As a noun, it refers to an aircraft journey. The word is used in contexts like scheduled flights, aviation, or describing the experience of flying.
